title: Has this happened to anyone before?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: So, I've been updating forever, and it just keeps going and going. Any ideas?

replies.body: Your connection to the patching server might be unstable, so it's backtracking to get missed updates and failing.  Run through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten up your settings and fix this up!
